title: Has BTS ever cried on stage? - Quora

response.answer_text: All of them have for different reasons. Rm: Being proud/Loving Army’s so much  Jin: Proud of winning award/Thankful for ARMY.  Young: Seeing parents for the first time in a wile/wining award  Jhope: Wining award/Thankful for fans/Video from family for his birthday a few years back.  Jimin: seeing Army’s sing forever young/wining award/Upset because he could not preform due to back pain/voice cracks during performance.  Taehyung: Wining award/ saying good bye to fans/Fighting with Jin/Reading letter Rm wrote him/Thinking he did a bad performance/ Telling Armys about his grandma.  Jungkook: Not being able to preform due to injury/seeing fans/ Seeing Tae cry about his grandma.  And last but not lease the time that got them all crying(With the exception of Yoongi) was at MAMA last year(I believe) Were they talking about how they almost disbanded.

All of the members of BTS have cried on stage. They are very emotional and beautiful creatures. They have never been afraid to share their emotions and their tears with the world. The fact is, they have affected so many peoples lives for the better. This feeling of positivity and love that they receive from the world shining back at them for their artistry humbles them. It brings them to tears. What is so endearing about BTS is that they are still so surprised at the fact that they are this global phenomenon. They still can't believe it is real and when they see the sold out stadiums and arenas of the thousands of people reflecting love and peace and joy back at them. Thats one hell of a feeling. Long story short, my babies are my fave cry babies!

Well, you know, I don't really know but…  0:00-0:30 0:00-0:30   0:00-0:30 0:00-0:30 These are just a few of those moments. I stan these boys who are not afraid to show their emotions on stage + you can feel how their hearts have been moved. Their humility is so admirable.

OMG! You must be joking. All of them cried on stage! They are emotional when it comes to love. I mean the love of ARMYs. For example they cried so hard when they were receiving an award. Or on the last day of Wings and LYS tours. It’s really sad to see them crying but when you understand the reason you kind of a little calm down
Yup!! They cried. Here watch this video.. whenever they cry it makes me sad and happy at the same time for without any reason…😭😭😭 omg..suga is soft hearted. 0:00-0:30 Have a great day. —Deevin••♡
